title: Darren's day out
creator_contributor_role: East Gippsland Institute of TAFE, executive producer
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Description and travel
Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Social life and customs
abstract: A slide show of contemporary Koori painting
description: A journey through Darren's colorful Koori paintings of Gippsland. His images depict his visit to Metung rocks, Kalimna and an Emu Farm, and through text, Darren conveys his thoughts and impressions of his day out. No dialogue only baclground sound effects. Created as part of the "Bute Utes the Movie" project in association with Regional Arts Victoria.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000602; Selected works from "Bute utes: the movie"; Active; 2003
